Index:

+++ 
@@ -2,5 +2,52 @@
 namespace Modules\StagedForm\app\Http\Requests;
 
 use Illuminate\Foundation\Http\FormRequest;
 
-class StepRequest extends FormRequest
\ No newline at end of file
+class StepRequest extends FormRequest
+{
+    public function rules()
+    {
+        return [
+            'email' => [
+                'required',
+                'string',
+                'email',
+                'max:255',
+                Rule::unique('users', 'email')
+                    ->where(function ($query) {
+                        $query->where('saas_account_id', 0);
+                    })
+            ],
+            'utm' => [],
+            'social_id' => [],
+            'social_email' => [],
+            'social_name' => [],
+            'social_avatar' => [],
+            'social_provider' => []
+        ];
+    }
+
+    public function bodyParameters()
+    {
+        return [
+            'tracking_uuid' => [
+                'description' => 'Visitor tracking UUID',
+                'example' => '765e9dd9-ceac-4a36-8006-9df7568ff5ec'
+            ],
+            'email' => [
+                'description' => 'Email Address',
+                'example' => 'john@example.com'
+            ]
+        ];
+    }
+
+    public function messages()
+    {
+        return [
+            'email.required' => __('The Email is required.'),
+            'email.string' => __('The Email must be a valid input.'),
+            'email.email' => __('The Email must be a valid email.'),
+            'email.unique' => __('This Email has been already taken.'),
+        ];
+    }
+}
\ No newline at end of file
